body: While the world awaits the release of more cable from Wikileaks, some unfortunate news comes from Kenya where the equivalent of Wikileaks – the anti-corruption watchdog Mars Group Kenya - inexplicably took down their website in mid December.
original_body: While the world awaits the release of more cable from Wikileaks, some unfortunate news comes from Kenya where the equivalent of Wikileaks – the anti-corruption watchdog Mars Group Kenya - inexplicably took down their website in mid December.
title: Kenya: Farewell Kenya's "Wikileaks"
